title: World Upside Down
overview: He Yan, the president of Fanxing Group, was in a car accident on the anniversary of her father's death. After being disfigured, her fiancé Yu Ge seized power. She asked Lin Xiao, who looked similar to her, to pretend to be her, trying to find evidence of Yu Ge's guilt. In the process, Yu Ge developed feelings for Lin Xiao, and Lin Xiao gradually wavered in their relationship. As the truth was revealed, He Yan's revenge plan, Yu Ge's life secrets, and Lin Xiao's life secrets intertwined, triggering a series of emotional entanglements and fierce conflicts.
